```{r}
CKD_selected_clean$Case <- factor(
  CKD_selected_clean$Case,
  levels = c(0, 1),
  labels = c("Control", "CKD")
)
```

```{r}
summary(CKD_selected_clean)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)

rf_ckd <- randomForest(
  Case ~ .,
  data = CKD_selected_clean,
  ntree = 500,        
  mtry = 4,
  importance = TRUE
)

print(rf_ckd)

```

```{r}
plot(rf_ckd)
```

```{r}
varImpPlot(rf_ckd)
```

```{r}
varImpPlot(rf_ckd, type = 2)
```
